data.title: Conchbooks
data.text: ConchBooks publishing house, bookshop and antiquarian k. & c. groh, mainzer str. 25 55546 hackenheim, germany natn. publisher no. 94844 web-site: www.conchbooks.de internatn. publisher nos. 3-925919 and 3-939767 phone +49-671-66441 & -68664 (private) Catalogue 47 fax +49-671-8963942 e-mail: conchbooks@conchbooks.de Books & Papers mainly on Mollusks Terms of sale (exerpt): All prices are in € (Euro) net (customers of the EU have to pay an additional 7% VAT) plus postage (reg. book-parcel, surface, approx. 4,30 €/kg plus 2,05 € registration). Please don’t mix up the currency i.e. € (Euro) with US-$! Transport at the buyers risk. Returns are only accepted within 7 days after receipt. Payment is due on receipt of invoice and may be made by internatn. postal money order or money transfer to our bank account. We also accept VISA-, Amex- and Master-credit-cards free of charge. For payments by private cheque, not drawn on a German bank we unfortunately have to add an additional 15 € (due to high bank-charges). The cheapest way for customers of the EU is a money.transfer to our bank-account (use IBAN and SWIFT to get it at national charges). For customers from outside the EU, credit-card-payments are the cheapest and quickest. You also may pay with PayPal and Western Union. New customers may be asked to pay in advance or with a credit-card. Prices of new books are subject to publishers revision and fluctuating exchange rates. If an increase is less than 10% the order will be fulfilled without prior notification. As many new books are obtained to order from abroad, there may be a delay in delivery (up to six months). You will be notified that the item will be delivered at a later date. If you wish to cancel your order for such items due to the delay please notify us immediately. This catalogue supersedes all prior catalogues in regard to price and conditions of sale. Newly published titles are indicated by grey shading. Abbreviations : br. = brochure; S. = pages; Taf. = plates; geb. = bound.; Ln = cloth; Ldr = Leather; H = Half-; col. = coloured; geh. = stapled; gr. = large; kl. = small; 8 = 8vo; 4 = 4to; Fol. = Folio; Fig. = figures; Kte =map; Ktn = Ktn; Tab. = table; ill. = illustrated New acquisitions December 2007 to April 2009 W04691 ABBOTT, R. T. (1972): Kingdom of the seashells. -- 256 S., zahlr. s/w Abb., br. 4 ** 12,00 € W04688 ABBOTT, R. T. (1989): Collectible Florida Shells. -- 64 S., zahlr. Farbabb., brosch., Gr.8 ** 9,00 € W05514 ABBOTT, R. T. (1991): Seashells of South East Asia. -- 145 pp., 52 col.pls., broch., 8 ** 26,00 € W08876 ABBOTT, R. T. (1991): Seashells of the northern hemisphere. -- 191 S., vollst. col. ill., Ln. geb. 4 ** 38,00 € W08715 ABBOTT, R. T. (1994): Muschel und Meeresschnecken. -- 160 S., 160 Farbabb., Ln. geb. gr 4 ** 20,00 €
